posts.post_title: N300 Mayo Buck Ewing SGC 40 - no longer available
posts.post_content:
Cleveland version. No creases, just honest wear.  A sgc 55 just went for $7500 and a 2 just sold for $3480.  Compare mine to the sgc 50 currently listed on ebay for $8750.  Pm or email me for more info, including back pic.  Thanks for looking.  

Angyale
